00084 /**************************************************************************/
00092 int BSP_EbiInit(void)
00093 {
00094 #if defined( BSP_STK_USE_EBI )
00095   /* ------------------------------------------ */
00096   /* NAND Flash, Bank0, Base Address 0x80000000 */
00097   /* Micron flash NAND256W3A                    */
00098   /* ------------------------------------------ */
00099 
00100   EBI_Init_TypeDef ebiConfig =
00101   {   ebiModeD8A8,       /* 8 bit address, 8 bit data */
00102       ebiActiveLow,      /* ARDY polarity */
00103       ebiActiveLow,      /* ALE polarity */
00104       ebiActiveLow,      /* WE polarity */
00105       ebiActiveLow,      /* RE polarity */
00106       ebiActiveLow,      /* CS polarity */
00107       ebiActiveLow,      /* BL polarity */
00108       false,             /* disble BL */
00109       true,              /* enable NOIDLE */
00110       false,             /* disable ARDY */
00111       true,              /* disable ARDY timeout */
00112       EBI_BANK0,         /* enable bank 0 */
00113       0,                 /* no chip select */
00114       0,                 /* addr setup cycles */
00115       0,                 /* addr hold cycles */
00116       false,             /* disable half cycle ALE strobe */
00117       0,                 /* read setup cycles */
00118       2,                 /* read strobe cycles */
00119       1,                 /* read hold cycles */
00120       false,             /* disable page mode */
00121       false,             /* disable prefetch */
00122       false,             /* disable half cycle REn strobe */
00123       0,                 /* write setup cycles */
00124       2,                 /* write strobe cycles */
00125       1,                 /* write hold cycles */
00126       false,             /* enable the write buffer */
00127       false,             /* disable half cycle WEn strobe */
00128       ebiALowA24,        /* ALB - Low bound, address lines */
00129       ebiAHighA26,       /* APEN - High bound, address lines */
00130       ebiLocation1,      /* Use Location 1 */
00131       true,              /* enable EBI */
00132   };
00133 
00134   /* Enable clocks */
00135   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_HFPER, true);
00136   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_GPIO, true);
00137   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_EBI, true);
00138 
00139   /* Enable GPIO's */
00140   /* ALE and CLE */
00141   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortC, 1, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00142   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortC, 2, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00143 
00144   /* WP, CE and R/B */
00145   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 13, gpioModePushPull, 0);   /* active low write-protect */
00146   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 14, gpioModePushPull, 1);   /* active low chip-enable */
00147   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 15, gpioModeInput, 0);      /* ready/busy */
00148 
00149   /* IO pins */
00150   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 8, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00151   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 9, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00152   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 10, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00153   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 11, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00154   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 12, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00155   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 13, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00156   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 14, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00157   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 15, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00158 
00159   /* WE and RE */
00160   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 8, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00161   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 9, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00162 
00163   /* NAND Power Enable */
00164   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 15, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00165 
00166   EBI_Init(&ebiConfig);
00167   EBI->NANDCTRL = (EBI_NANDCTRL_BANKSEL_BANK0 | EBI_NANDCTRL_EN);
00168 
00169   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00170 #else
00171   return BSP_STATUS_NOT_IMPLEMENTED;
00172 #endif
00173 }

00176 /**************************************************************************/
00184 int BSP_Init(uint32_t flags)
00185 {
00186   if ( flags & BSP_INIT_STK_BCUART )
00187   {
00188     CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_HFPER, true);
00189     CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_GPIO, true);
00190 
00191     /* Configure GPIO pin for USART TX */
00192     /* To avoid false start, configure output as high. */
00193     GPIO_PinModeSet(BSP_BC_USART_TXPORT, BSP_BC_USART_TXPIN,
00194                     gpioModePushPull, 1);
00195 
00196     /* Configure GPIO pin for USART RX */
00197     GPIO_PinModeSet(BSP_BC_USART_RXPORT, BSP_BC_USART_RXPIN,
00198                     gpioModeInput, 1);
00199 
00200     /* Enable switch U602A "VMCU switch" - to enable USART communication. */
00201     /* See board schematics for details. */
00202     GPIO_PinModeSet(BSP_BC_U602A_PORT, BSP_BC_U602A_PIN,
00203                     gpioModePushPull, 1);
00204 
00205     CMU_ClockEnable(BSP_BC_USART_CLK, true);
00206 
00207     /* Initialize USART */
00208     USART_InitAsync(BSP_BC_USART, &usartInit);
00209 
00210     /* Enable correct USART location. */
00211     BSP_BC_USART->ROUTE = USART_ROUTE_RXPEN | USART_ROUTE_TXPEN |
00212                           BSP_BC_USART_LOCATION;
00213   }
00214 
00215   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00216 }
00219 /**************************************************************************/
00229 float BSP_CurrentGet(void)
00230 {
00231   STK_Packet pkt;
00232   float      current;
00233 
00234   pkt.type          = STK_PACKETTYPE_CURRENT_REQ;
00235   pkt.payloadLength = 0;
00236 
00237   /* Send Request/Get reply */
00238   PacketSend(&pkt);
00239   PacketReceive(&pkt);
00240 
00241   /* Process reply */
00242   if (pkt.type == STK_PACKETTYPE_CURRENT_REPLY)
00243   {
00244     memcpy(&current, pkt.data, sizeof(float));
00245     return current;
00246   }
00247   else
00248   {
00249     return (float) 0.0;
00250   }
00251 }
00252 
00253 /**************************************************************************/
00263 float BSP_VoltageGet(void)
00264 {
00265   STK_Packet pkt;
00266   float      voltage;
00267 
00268   pkt.type          = STK_PACKETTYPE_VOLTAGE_REQ;
00269   pkt.payloadLength = 0;
00270 
00271   /* Send Request/Get reply */
00272   PacketSend(&pkt);
00273   PacketReceive(&pkt);
00274 
00275   /* Process reply */
00276   if (pkt.type == STK_PACKETTYPE_VOLTAGE_REPLY)
00277   {
00278     memcpy(&voltage, pkt.data, sizeof(float));
00279     return voltage;
00280   }
00281   else
00282   {
00283     return (float) 0.0;
00284   }
00285 }
00286 
00289 static bool PacketReceive(STK_Packet *pkt)
00290 {
00291   uint8_t *rxPtr = (uint8_t *) pkt;
00292   int     length;
00293 
00294   /* Receive packet magic */
00295   while (!(BSP_BC_USART->STATUS & USART_STATUS_RXDATAV)) ;
00296   *rxPtr++ = BSP_BC_USART->RXDATA;
00297   if (pkt->magic != STK_MAGIC)
00298   {
00299     /* Invalid packet */
00300     memset(pkt, 0x00, sizeof(STK_Packet));
00301     return false;
00302   }
00303 
00304   /* Receive packet type */
00305   while (!(BSP_BC_USART->STATUS & USART_STATUS_RXDATAV)) ;
00306   *rxPtr++ = BSP_BC_USART->RXDATA;
00307   if ((pkt->type < STK_PACKETTYPE_FIRST) || (pkt->type > STK_PACKETTYPE_LAST))
00308   {
00309     /* Invalid packet */
00310     memset(pkt, 0x00, sizeof(STK_Packet));
00311     return false;
00312   }
00313 
00314   /* Receive packet length */
00315   while (!(BSP_BC_USART->STATUS & USART_STATUS_RXDATAV)) ;
00316   *rxPtr++ = BSP_BC_USART->RXDATA;
00317   if (pkt->payloadLength > STK_PACKET_SIZE)
00318   {
00319     /* Invalid packet */
00320     memset(pkt, 0x00, sizeof(STK_Packet));
00321     return false;
00322   }
00323 
00324 #if ( BSP_STK_BCP_VERSION == 2 )
00325   /* Receive reserved byte */
00326   while (!(BSP_BC_USART->STATUS & USART_STATUS_RXDATAV)) ;
00327   *rxPtr++ = BSP_BC_USART->RXDATA;
00328 #endif
00329 
00330   /* Receive packet data */
00331   length = pkt->payloadLength;
00332   if (length > STK_PACKET_SIZE)
00333   {
00334     length = STK_PACKET_SIZE;
00335   }
00336   while (length)
00337   {
00338     while (!(BSP_BC_USART->STATUS & USART_STATUS_RXDATAV)) ;
00339     *rxPtr++ = BSP_BC_USART->RXDATA;
00340     length--;
00341   }
00342 
00343   return true;
00344 }
00345 
00346 __STATIC_INLINE void txByte(uint8_t data)
00347 {
00348   /* Check that transmit buffer is empty */
00349   while (!(BSP_BC_USART->STATUS & USART_STATUS_TXBL)) ;
00350   BSP_BC_USART->TXDATA = (uint32_t) data;
00351 }
00352 
00353 static void PacketSend(STK_Packet *pkt)
00354 {
00355   int i;
00356 
00357   /* Apply magic */
00358   pkt->magic = STK_MAGIC;
00359 
00360   /* Transmit packet magic */
00361   txByte(pkt->magic);
00362   /* Transmit packet type */
00363   txByte(pkt->type);
00364   /* Transmit packet length */
00365   txByte(pkt->payloadLength);
00366 
00367 #if ( BSP_STK_BCP_VERSION == 2 )
00368   /* Transmit reserved byte */
00369   txByte(pkt->reserved);
00370 #endif
00371 
00372   /* Transmit packet payload */
00373   for (i = 0; i < pkt->payloadLength; i++)
00374   {
00375     txByte(pkt->data[i]);
00376   }
00377 }
